remarkably worn, to the point where some of the words

"Deja vu - the use of electrical impulses to ______
memories provoked by similar past events."
"(...)Another theory states, that deja-vus are the
result of an electric malfunction within the brain,
wronlgy appointing a current memory as a past memory
therefore creating dissonance in the recipient."
"(...)After collecting data from a vast pool of test
subjects, it was found that the electrical pulses
of some recipients could be measured during the
"There was a trend linked to traumatic experiences
and negative emotions within the test subjects
pulses within the qualified test subjects, some
reported new memories of events they couldn't have
"(...)Some researchers claim that these memories are
proof of 'other world' theories, however there has yet
to be any substantial evidence of such claims."
